item.title: Markdown and Shortcodes
item.description: Special thanks to Markdown Cheatsheet. What is Markdown Markdown is a plain text formatting syntax for writers. It allows you to quickly write structured content for the web, and have it seamlessly converted to clean, structured HTML. # H1 ## H2 ### H3 #### H4 ##### H5 ###### H6 Alt-H1 ====== Alt-H2 ------ H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 Alt-H1 Alt-H2 Emphasis, aka italics, with asterisks or underscores.
